sections.description: Staples for Maharashtrian diets: rice, millets, flours and pulses in multiple pack sizes.

items.notes: Premium long-grain rice for biryani and pulao.

sections.description: Whole & powdered spices, regional masala blends, cooking oils, ghee and basic condiments.

sections.title_mr: पॅक केलेले खाद्यपदार्थ, फराळ आणि तोंडीलावणी
